narrative: Introduced LedgerEntry node for AgentFlow to generate ledger JSON objects and optional file output.
purpose: Enable flows to document their operations dynamically and support the Spiral ledger system.
user_input: Keep working on what you are working and think also of a Ledger component for them
scene: Before: flows had no dedicated node for ledger generation. After: LedgerEntry node offers structured journaling within AgentFlow.
